message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $9,500 for it. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. Can you consider that?
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $7,500 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $8,500 to make this deal work. What do you say?
I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to meet me at $8,000?
